A request

During encoding please consider such bitrate that a movie (i.e. The Matrix) is converted with in the size of 4.38 GB (DVD-R) with a DTS sound of English
and if not possible, convert it with the size that can be split and burned in 2xDVD-R (i.e. 7 GB, 6.8 GB, 7.5 GB, 8.5 GB etc.)
not with a size that confuses everyone during burning (i.e. 4.4 GB, 5 GB. 8.8 GB etc.)

and this is only a humble request

By the way your comment at "Hellboy Duology (2004, 2008) 1080p multi [mkvonly]" was kinda weird. I can't believe you like "Underworld" more then Hellboy, but c'est la vie. I personally thought "Hellboy"-s are some of the best movies in it's genre.

@fasurvivor
I encode to bitrate (6 MB/s for 1080p/1080 16/9 AR & 5.3 MB/s for 1080/800 etc.). I don't ruin a video quality just to fit a DVD.
It's sad how some rippers ( PS3-TEAM  ) make all movies 4 GB no matter how long the movies are, so a 2 H movie will result in a much more inferior quality then a 1H 30 min movie.

please stop rating the torrent (+ & -) if you haven't seen yet the movies.
Leave a comment (after you saw the movies ) instead of a click, don't be lazy ;-)
The rating system on this tracker is worthless and shouldn't be taken in account.

Del Torro's imagination is a beautiful thing. He has created some of the most fascinating creatures that traditional Hollywood doesn't have the guts or inclination to ever assemble.
Hellboy is no exception and it has a great dark comic book atmosphere.

Too bad that the story and most of the characters don't really work out the way they're supposed to.

So,
"Visually it's outstanding, Mentally it's mediocre," or, "Quite stylish but somewhat disappointing movie"
